title: Stage Rush - Imagine Dragons v2500 + mod
description:
Play for a cause! Connect with the hit rock band Imagine Dragons and support their charity, the Tyler Robinson Foundation. TRF was founded by the band in 2013 to help families handle unexpected financial costs of pediatric cancer. For the first month of the game's $1 goes to TRF for every download purchase*. 

â€œIt is the absolute most important thing that we do as a band and our favorite thing that we do.â€ - Dan Reynolds, frontman of the Grammy Award-winning Imagine Dragons

Features:
â€¢ RUN AS IMAGINE DRAGONS through Las Vegas & Paris to the beat of their hit songs â€œDemons,â€ â€œRadioactive,â€ â€œShots,â€ â€œOn Top of the Worldâ€ and more! 
â€¢ GET EXCLUSIVE ACCESS â€“ Learn fun and interesting facts about the band, never before seen photographs, and the chance to ask questions 
â€¢ DRESS LIKE A ROCK STAR â€“ Buy outfits and accessories worn by the band members in their most popular videos
â€¢ UNLOCK SECRETS AND BONUSES â€“ Collect letters to unlock the secret bonus stage for in-game prizes!
â€¢ MAKE A DIFFERENCE -- For the 1st month, $1 from each download supports families fighting pediatric cancer through the Tyler Robinson Foundation*

Play Games. Be a Hero. Save the World. 
#PlayForaCause
#SlayCancerWithDragons

*From February 4, 2016 through March 4, 2016, Stage Rush:Imagine Dragons will donate $1 of every download purchase to the Tyler Robinson Foundation, a non-profit organization created by Imagine Dragons and the family of Tyler Robinson, and dedicated to strengthening families financially and emotionally as they cope with the tragedy of a pediatric cancer diagnosis. From March 5th, 2016, 25% of proceeds will go to TRF. For more on TRF, visit their website: trf.org

Requires Android OS: 4.0+
